Whether you’re visiting for a short market assessment or planning long-term expansion, network, negotiate, and explore setup opportunities without the need for a corporate sponsor or dealing with red tape. faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What is the validity period of a UAE tourist visa?
items.answer: A UAE tourist visa allows you to stay in the country for 10 to 60 days, depending on your application and unique needs.

items.question: How long can I stay in the UAE after my tourist visa expires?
items.answer: The UAE offers a 10-day grace period where you can apply for and obtain an extension. If you stay in the Emirates beyond this period, you may incur hefty fines or penalties.

items.question: Can I convert my tourist visa to a residence or investor visa?
items.answer: Yes, in most cases, your tourist visa can be converted without exiting the country. Our expert consultants assist in transitioning to your desired visa.

items.question: Can I apply for a UAE tourist visa without a local sponsor?
items.answer: Yes! Our seasoned advisors eliminate the need for a local UAE sponsor by streamlining the application process.

items.question: What documents do I need to apply for a UAE tourist visa?
items.answer: You’ll need copies of your passport, a recent photo, and basic travel information.
